    • getAllEvents

      public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<List<Event>> getAllEvents()
      This is the method you asked for, adapted from your lab. It listens for real-time updates from the "events" collection in Firestore and returns the data wrapped in LiveData.

      Parameters:
      eventId - UUID of the event we want to fetch.
      Returns:
      Task yielding a DocumentSnapshot which can be converted into an Event

    • getWaitlistSize

      public void getWaitlistSize(Event event, EventRepository.WaitlistSizeListener listener)
      Asynchronously fetches the size of the waitlist for a given event.
      Parameters:
      event - The event whose waitlist size is needed.
      listener - The callback to be invoked with the result.

    • getUserLocationFromWaitlist

      public void getUserLocationFromWaitlist(String userId, String eventId, EventRepository.UserLocationCallback callback)
      Fetches the GeoPoint for a specific user from an event's waitlist.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose location is to be fetched.
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      callback - The callback to handle the result.

    • getWaitlistLocations

      public void getWaitlistLocations(String eventId, EventRepository.WaitlistLocationsCallback callback)
      Asynchronously fetches the list of signup locations from the waitlist of a specific event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to fetch the waitlist locations for.
      callback - The callback to handle the success or failure of the operation.
